content:encoded:
The energy sector is experiencing its biggest transformation since the introduction of the combustion engine in the automobile, and many of the worldâ€™s top oil companies are racing to reinvent themselves to survive in the low carbon economy of the future. For them, it is change or die. Reuters is keeping readers and clients ahead, delivering exclusive news, insights and commentary on the accelerating changes in strategy, staffing and focus at some of the biggest oil companies, as well as an evocative series of stories on the fractured communities and politics that are the legacy of energy transitions.
